body:
Modifications : 
- [x] `netlib-blas` has been removed
- [x] `netlib-lapack` provides both `blas` and `lapack`
- [x] added `lapacke` variant

Problem I see with the current layout : 
- we split the build of a single tarball into two different packages
- we use two different build mechanism (`make` for `netlib-blas` and `cmake` for `netlib-lapack`)
- we don't build a shared version of `netlib-blas` just a relocatable one, and that is a pain
title: reworking package : netlib
